snippet: The American, Joshua Brown, 64, of New Hampshire, had been offering visitors sex with children for fees starting at $500.
abstract: Peruvian police announce they have arrested American man Joshua Brown, who is suspected of running child-sex ring from Lima over last 10 years; say they have rescued 11 victims and are investigating possible murders of two children.
lead_paragraph: The American, Joshua Brown, 64, of New Hampshire, had been offering visitors sex with children for fees starting at $500.

headline.main: Peru: American Is Accused of Running Online Child-Sex Ring for Tourists
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Peru: American Is Accused of Running Online Child-Sex Ring for Tourists
